verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: fired] [ARG1: a shot at U.S. allies France and Canada] [ARGM-TMP: just before the G7 summit of allied industrial powers] – [ARGM-ADV: blasting them for ' massive tariffs] . '
President Donald Trump fired a shot at U.S. allies France and Canada just before the G7 summit of [V: allied] [ARG1: industrial powers] – blasting them for ' massive tariffs . '
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] fired a shot at U.S. allies France and Canada just before the G7 summit of allied industrial powers – [V: blasting] [ARG1: them] [ARG2: for ' massive tariffs] . '
